channel.title: Changing exp rates on a 508 server. Not adverage problem
channel.description:
Hey, I know this is asked a lot and I've tried to follow tuts on how to do it. It's simple and just not working for me!
In my PlayerNPCCombat.java or PlayerCombat.java there is nothing that I can find to change how much exp you get.
In my server right now when you click the hay bale or door you get exp. I need to take that out. I'm thinking that the person who first designed this deleted the spots where you get exp from killing because my char doesn't get any exp when attacking a npc. So how would I go about putting it back into my scripts?

item.title: Changing exp rates on a 508 server. Not adverage problem
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Hmmm… mayb its the variable:

combatXpRate = 100;

just a guess…

Read full topic
item.source: Changing exp rates on a 508 server. Not adverage problem
